gui.numina.creative.install.all.desc: Installs all top tier compatible modules into selected modular item while player is in creative mode
gui.numina.creative.install.desc: Installs module into selected modular item while player is in creative mode
item.numina.battery_1.desc: Integrate a battery to allow the item to store energy.
item.numina.battery_2.desc: Integrate a battery to allow the item to store energy.
item.numina.battery_3.desc: Integrate a the most advanced battery to store an extensive amount of energy.
item.numina.battery_4.desc: Experimental high end power storage device, now with almost no chance of exploding (we think). Despite nasty rumors, it is not based on stolen alien technology.
An electrical, artificial muscle, with less range of movement than human muscle but orders of magnitude more strength.
item.numina.component_capacitor_4.desc: A drastically improved, overly powerful capacitor.
item.numina.component_carbon_myofiber.de: A small bundle of carbon fibers, refined for use in artificial muscles.
item.numina.component_computer_chip.desc: An upgraded control circuit that contains a CPU which is capable of more advanced calculations.
Are you sure this thing will actually work? Is it supposed to smoke like that?
Oh, look. It kind of works now.
A simple networkable microcontroller for coordinating an individual component.
item.numina.component_field_emitter.desc: An advanced device which directly manipulates electromagnetic and gravitational fields in an area.
item.numina.component_glider_wing.desc: A lightweight aerodynamic wing with an electromagnet for quick deployment and retraction.
item.numina.component_ion_thruster.desc: Essentially a miniature particle accelerator. Accelerates ions to near-light speed to produce thrust.
item.numina.component_laser_emitter.desc: A multicolored laser array which can cheaply alter the appearance of something.
item.numina.component_magnet.desc: A metallic device that generates a magnetic field which pulls items towards the player.
item.numina.component_myofiber_gel.desc: A thick, conductive paste, perfect for fitting between myofibers in an artificial muscle.
item.numina.component_parachute.desc: A simple reusable parachute which can be deployed and recovered in midair.
item.numina.component_rubber_hose.desc: A heavily insulated rubber hose capable of withstanding extreme heat or cold
item.numina.component_servo.desc: A special type of motor which uses a pulse-modulated signal to enact very precise movements.
item.numina.component_solar_panel.desc: A light sensitive device that will generate electricity from the sun.
item.numina.component_solenoid.desc: Wires wound around a ferromagnetic core produces a basic electromagnet.
item.numina.component_wiring_copper.desc: A special type of wiring with high voltaic capacity and precision, necessary for the sensitive electronics in power armor.
tooltip.numina.changeModes: Change modes: Press and hold the number of the hotbar slot the Power Fist is in.
tooltip.numina.noModules: No installed modules! This item is useless until you add some modules at a Tinker Table.
